column2: BRIEF-Associated Bank announces financial relief measures to support customers affected by COVID-19 March 21 (Reuters) - Associated Banc-Corp: * ASSOCIATED BANC-CORP- ASSOCIATED BANK’S COVID-19 RELIEF PROGRAM INCLUDES SUSPENDING FEES ON A RANGE OF LOAN AND DEPOSIT PRODUCTS UP TO 90 DAYS * ASSOCIATED BANC-CORP- ASSOCIATED BANK’S COVID-19 RELIEF PROGRAM HAS CREDIT CARD PAYMENT RELIEF & SUSPENSION OF FORECLOSURE & REPOSSESSION PROGRAMS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Associated Banc Says To Temporarily Suspend Lobby Access At Most Of Its Branch Locations March 15 (Reuters) - Associated Banc-Corp: * PLANS TO TEMPORARILY SUSPEND LOBBY ACCESS AT MOST OF ITS BRANCH LOCATIONS * SUSPENSION OF LOBBY ACCESS AT MOST BRANCES TO GO INTO EFFECT TUESDAY, MARCH 17 * COMPANY PLANS TO RESUME FULL BRANCH ACCESS ON MONDAY, APRIL 13, 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Associated Banc-Corp - Philip Flynn, President, CEO Entered Into Trading Plan To Sell 80,000 Shares Of Common Stock May 2 (Reuters) - Associated Banc-Corp: * ASSOCIATED BANC-CORP - PHILIP B. FLYNN, PRESIDENT, CEO OF CO ENTERED INTO RULE 10B5-1 TRADING PLAN TO SELL 80,000 SHARES OF CO'S COMMON STOCK Source text: (bit.ly/2JMYY5X) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Associated Banc-Corp To Acquire Anderson Insurance & Investment Agency May 1 (Reuters) - Associated Banc-Corp: * ASSOCIATED BANC-CORP TO ACQUIRE ANDERSON INSURANCE & INVESTMENT AGENCY, INC. * ASSOCIATED BANC-CORP - TERMS OF TRANSACTION WERE NOT DISCLOSED. * ASSOCIATED BANC-CORP - AS PART OF PROPOSED TRANSACTION, KEY ANDERSON EXECUTIVES WILL CONTINUE LEADERSHIP ROLES FOR SOME TIME Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Associated Banc-Corp Announces Dividends, Share Repurchase Program April 24 (Reuters) - Associated Banc-Corp: * ASSOCIATED ANNOUNCES ANNUAL MEETING RESULTS, DIVIDENDS AND SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM * BOARD AUTHORIZED REPURCHASE OF UP TO $100 MILLION OF ASSOCIATED’S COMMON STOCK * REPURCHASE AUTHORIZATION IS IN ADDITION TO AUTHORITY REMAINING UNDER PREVIOUS PROGRAM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Associated Banc-Corp Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.40 Excluding Items April 19 (Reuters) - Associated Banc-Corp: * REPORTS FIRST QUARTER EARNINGS OF $0.40 PER COMMON SHARE, OR $0.50 PER COMMON SHARE EXCLUDING $21 MILLION IN ACQUISITION RELATED COSTS(1) * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.41 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME OF $210 MILLION INCREASED $30 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
